subject: Follow-up: Strosin, Torp and Grimes investment committee meeting
body:
Hi Thomas,

Hope you are well.

I'm following up on the investment committee meeting. We require an update by EOD next week for our trustees.

Could you please provide a status update?

Kind regards,
David Chen

subject: URGENT: Portfolio Adjustment for TWUSUPER
body:
Team,

Client instruction just came down. We need to immediately reduce the energy sector holdings.

Please drop everything and model out the implications. I need execution levels and a full impact analysis on my desk in 2 hours.

Sarah Connor

Sarah Connor
